website_summaries.verdict: Fragrant and lightweight, botanical-based skincare product made with cold-pressed organic essential oils.
pros: Soothes irritations and re-energizes your skin for a radiant glow
Softens skin, reduces appearance of wrinkles, smooths fine lines, and evens skin tone
Lovely fragrance and good-sized bottle for the price
cons: The scent of this oil does not agree with everyone.Some users find it doesn't absorb as well as expected

customer_reviews.title: Be careful when reviewing so called reviews
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product based on the reviews However, when I received the product, the outer packaging contains a “hook” to receive the product FREE if you write a review of the product. I lost interest because I doubt that the reviews are unbiased. Probably based on customers who want a free product. See the photo I uploaded of the package insert
customer_reviews.author: Hayley

customer_reviews.title: I get lots of compliments!
customer_reviews.text: I liked that it came in a nice size bottle. Didn't like that the bottle is clear, it should've been Amber in color to block out the sun light to help preserve it's contents. I used it on my face,neck and chest area. I love the way it makes my skin feel. I have been using it for 3 yrs now, I get a lot of compliments on my skin and at 60yrs old I'll take it!
customer_reviews.author: Lillian N.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product & customer service
customer_reviews.text: I love this oil! It smells beautiful...a lovely rose scent that is amazing. It soaks right in and doesn’t feel greasy at all. My skin is really dry in the winter and a lot of products either don’t work or feel overly heavy. This oil makes my skin really soft! The little rosebuds in the bottle are a nice touch as well! :-) I received excellent customer service from this company! The first bottle I got didn’t smell right. I reviewed it on their website and was immediately contacted with a friendly email. I received a new bottle within days that smelled wonderful! I am 100% happy with both the service I received and this awesome oil! Thank you Amaki!
customer_reviews.author: Ceal

customer_reviews.title: My absolute go to product!
customer_reviews.text: I wish i had before and after photos because I love this stuff. It is my absolute go to product. I use it everyday. This oil has given my skin a wonderful even glow and has helped lightened up old acne spots I thought I'd never get rid of. No, the lightening didn't happen over night but the more I've used the product the better they've looked. My skin is on the dryer side so I can't say how this would do for super oily skin but for combo/dry skin I highly recommend it. Great for winter months as well.
customer_reviews.author: tc

customer_reviews.title: not the same as before .
customer_reviews.text: I bought this before with old packaging and it smelled nice and was great. I reordered and this one came in different packaging and does not have same smell or color. something has changed and this order is not as good as before.
customer_reviews.author: meitenezeltene

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product!! It makes my dry skin super comfortable. The first night I put it on, the smell really bothered me, but then, weirdly it kinda grew on me, and now I bearly smelled it anymore. I thought of adding fragrance but it would be kinda counter-purpose! But then something unexpected happened : My skin texture started disappearing... I have acne scars from when I was like 13 (I'm 29) and they are almost gone!! Pores are becoming invisible,... This is really amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: L❤️VE!!! Beautiful product!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this Jasmine and Rose facial oil! ❤️ I use it at night and it has helped my skin to become more luminous, soft, even-toned, smaller pores and less fine lines. Beautiful, beautiful product!! I am also oily/acne prone, so I added about 12 drops of tea tree oil to this oil (for additional antibacterial benefit) and shook it up REALLY good ...... my acne breakouts have completely stopped. My skin is clear and smooth. I am so happy and so impressed! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel28

customer_reviews.title: YES! YES! YES! HOLY GRAIL! 10/10
customer_reviews.text: It feels like a luxury product without the luxury price. I'm in love with this! This is an all in one product, each of the oils individually have their own skin perfecting properties and buying each individually would cost a fortune so I'm so excited that this has it all! I have excessively dry skin and I've tried multiple products to alleviate that all the way from high end foundations to Korean skin care. But I've found my holy grail! & for those who have normal to oily dry skin I would still recommend. It dries really well but I would use a little less. Also! It smells so nice!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: It earns its stars!
customer_reviews.text: Love this light oil AND the smell! It goes on smooth and does make a difference in skin softness. I notice I have no dry skin in the winter now! That said, oils, even light oils leave a a bit of oily residue on skin so in the morning I can tell the hair that swept across my face while turning at night absorbs a bit of it so if you can, pull it back at night unless you shower and wash your hair each am! After one night it’s not bad but it makes a difference after a couple if you was it every 2 - 3 days. Small price for the benefits of this oil though!
customer_reviews.author: Mayanmoonz

customer_reviews.title: No smell and greasy!!
customer_reviews.text: People state they love the smell; however, the bottle I received there is absolutely no smell and the oil which makes me wonder what exactly did they use to make this and it does not absorb well. I also use the same oils from doterra and know what it should smell like and this just seems like it is canola oil with rose buds floating. The oil is also really greasy which caused me to break out. I am returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Kauai17

customer_reviews.text: I was looking for an organic, light body oil to help keep my skin moisturized this pregnancy and came across Amaki. I am highly sensitive to strong fragrance so I was a little worried it would be too much smell for me, but it is one of the most pleasant scents I have found (even my husband loves it). I use it nightly after my shower before bed and it goes on smooth absorbing very well and leaving my skin hydrated and nourished. I'm so glad I ordered this and look forward to continuing to use it and reaping the benefits of well nourished skin.
customer_reviews.author: GrierP

customer_reviews.title: Only product I need!
customer_reviews.text: I love this so much! This is now the only product I use. I have not had any acne since starting this, my skin tone is even, my wrinkles have reduced, and I no longer need to wear foundation, concealer, etc. My skin has a natural dewey complexion. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Couldn’t get past the smell.
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love the Amaki Organic Jasmine and Rose oil, however, I just was not able to get past the fragrance. The oil blend in the description were all solid and for most people it would have been great but it just did not work for me. I don’t know exactly which of the essential oil disagreed with me because I love both jasmine and rose oils. Maybe the combination of the other oils just mixed it. I’m returning the bottle. I will just be sticking with their camelia anti-aging oil. The fragrance in this essential oil is nice and light.
customer_reviews.author: Roma

customer_reviews.title: I do really like this oil
customer_reviews.text: I do really like this oil. It's pretty all purpose for me. Since it contains so many different oils. I use it for hair, face, nails, and any place on my body that is rough. I mix with my moisturizer in morning and night. Very lux feeling. I have also been using witch hazel as a toner and so far these combos. Have cleared and brighten my complexion. I also do eat fair amount of veggies and green juices and drink lot of water. So I think it's a great addition to my routine.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle B.

customer_reviews.title: Very good moisturizing body/face oil
customer_reviews.text: This is a great body/face oil. Its not heavy or greasy at all. It goes on lightly and feels like velvet on your skin. I used it before my makeup and it worked great. The scent is a little strong, more musky and definate rosehip seed smell. But a good combination of oils. Also the size of this bottle is great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The oil is soothing and soaks up nicely. I add a dropper full in my bath ...
customer_reviews.text: This oil has a very pleasant scent. It's earthy and organic - not fake and factory process smelling. The oil is soothing and soaks up nicely. I add a dropper full in my bath and it makes the bath smell FANTASTIC and skin soft. I've not used it for my hair, will experiment with that in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: My Go To Oil!
customer_reviews.text: I love this oil! It smells amazing. It doesn't leave me skin oily as it absorbs very well AND it's hydrating. I use this oil around my hair line to combat dryness, after a shower as a moisture sealant and on my lips. It's definitely a staple product for me. I also noticed the brand has revamped the design. I'm going to have to order another bottle. Hopefully the formula didn't change.
customer_reviews.author: Angela. A

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Inside and Out
customer_reviews.text: This is very moisturizing under makeup or alone. A little goes a long way. The bottle is larger than I expected. This will last me a very long time. The smell is fresh and light, not overpowering. The packaging itself is also very beautiful if you like minimalist design. It could definitely be a really nice gift.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: This is one of the best purchases I have made
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best purchases I have made. The facial oil is made with all the big ingredients for anti aging skin care and it is just lovely to put on. It has a beautiful fragrance and works wonders on my skin. The bottle is huge and the price is unbelievable!
customer_reviews.author: maureen

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Amaki for 3 years or maybe more. My one complaint is it used to smell great. Now there's no fragrance at all. My last bottle came with a promo to get a free bottle. Please don't let this influence you from giving this product a try. Promo or not--it's terrific. I not only use it on my face but insect bites, dry spots in winter. Whatever. It works.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Calvo

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: I really like this stuff so far..after a few days of use at night my skin seems brighter and my dark cricles are reduced. the scent is probably not for everybody and use with caution around the eyes as I've found it burns if you actually get it in your eye
customer_reviews.author: Rachel H.

customer_reviews.title: Good product, but dried roses molded and changed my opinion
customer_reviews.text: I loved the smell of this product, and the array of natural oils used. However, over time the roses certainly molded. Maybe this product would be better without the roses, or in a smaller container. I should have removed them but I did not know they would mold so soon. Other skincare oils I have used I have not had this problem with.
customer_reviews.author: Keira Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Has a strong smell
customer_reviews.text: I love the presentation of the oil, having those floating roses is a nice touch. But personally the smell is too strong and just not for me. I have noticed softer skin but again when I regularly moisturize it's the same. It just hasn't really done anything big for me to notice to keep wanting to purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: major breakouts
customer_reviews.text: i actually like this product. i love the the way it makes my skin feel, but i really think it's making my skin worse. i was hoping to downscale my skin routine due to my recent breakouts. i have read a lot about oils for your face in the past and have done a lot of research. i don't know if this is a combination of these specific oils or if my skin is still in the "purge" phase, but sadly i am disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: redhoop

customer_reviews.title: The smell was ok, but the oil was very ...
customer_reviews.text: The smell was ok, but the oil was very heavy, a lot heavier than other facial oils I've used. I would hesitate to use this during the day time or mixed with other lotions, maybe just at night.
customer_reviews.author: A. H.

customer_reviews.title: Great for faces
customer_reviews.text: I have been very impressed! I exfoliate my face once or twice a week Most the time I just washed my face with (hot, Luke warm water or cold) water morning and night, if I work out or if this feels dirty sometimes a third time . After just washed my face with water I've been applying this oil. My face is super clear, I haven't had any blackheads or zits and my face is hydrated. I highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Tegan

customer_reviews.title: This is Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: I have used many different facial oils but this one really does a wonderful job on my face! Love the smell, love the little roses in the oil and best of all, I love the different blends of good-for-your-skin oils in there. I can't recommend it enough.
customer_reviews.author: AvidHerbalist

customer_reviews.title: Not just pretty, but also very nice on the skin
customer_reviews.text: Not just pretty, but also very nice on the skin. My turkey neck is looking better as are my hands and nails. Lovely scent I believe this bottle will last awhile and when that happens a second bottle will be purchased! Thanks, Amaki!
customer_reviews.author: SRKTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Scent, Great Formula- My Favorite Oil Ever
customer_reviews.text: This oil is bliss! Very moisturizing and the scent is intoxicating... Everytime I use it someone says how good I smell! Plus, the rose buds in the bottle are such a beautiful touch. Organic and doesn't irratate my sensitive skin at all. I use it on my face, body and in my hair sometimes to add gloss and moisture between washings. I wish I could buy a bigger bottle!!! Would love to know if they do have plans to make a larger size, even if it was $65-75 it would be worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria W.

customer_reviews.title: Wow, this is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I have oily skin so I avoid oily products but the review on this one was so good, I had to try. This goes on smoothly and does not feel sticky or greasy. The smell is amazing and I love the way my skin feels.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Leonard

customer_reviews.title: Omg holy grail
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how this oil worked but it seriously made my pores so much smaller on my nose!!! So happy I made this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Anisha Jethva

customer_reviews.title: Nice face oil
customer_reviews.text: Love the simple, pure ingredients. It’s just straight up oils, no additional synthetic preservatives or silicones. It’s more liquid than I expected or seen with other oils, almost like water, and takes a couple minutes to really absorb in the skin. I use it on my face and looks shiny as soon as I apply it, but becomes completely non-greasy in a couple minutes. Really like the soft scent, and how well it hydrates my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Step91

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Oil
customer_reviews.text: This oil is amazing! I was hesitant to purchase this product because there was some reviews regarding the smell and I'm very sensitive to smell. However, this oil smells like baby roses. Unless you don't like how baby roses mixed with amazing, you probably shouldn't purchase this product. This product might be too good for you. I'll be purchasing this product again . . . and again . . . and again.
customer_reviews.author: Nelle Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Good oil, I have use it only one day
customer_reviews.text: Good oil, I have use it only one day, the smell it's not good, my complain it's that didn't came seal it, so I hope it's new and original
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Perez

customer_reviews.title: Very Strong Scent (To Me)
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this because I will use only natural skin care products, but the smell is too strong for me. It seems too strong to be a natural scent. The oils are great and do not cause my skin to break out or be irritated. I won't be reordering, though, because of the strong scent.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Really really good
customer_reviews.text: Been using this as part of my skin care & this is soo good, there’s real pieces of rose petals in this oil and it smells like actual roses too so don’t expect a perfume rose scent but the product is great so is the size of the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Elaha

customer_reviews.title: Very Mosturizing
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the most versatile oils I have used. The blend is perfect for face or body. I always mix a little into my Cerave cream and into my moisturizers and foundation. I have the driest skin you can imagine and this really helps. I love the smell too. It also works great in your hair without making it greasy. I just put a drop or two in the length of my hair.I also use it for my toenails and fingernails. Just an all-purpose product.
customer_reviews.author: cindy pruitt

customer_reviews.title: this stuff is the best product I have purchased in a while
customer_reviews.text: Oh my goodness.....this stuff is the best product I have purchased in a while! I always do a "My fave products Basket" for my mom and sister for Christmas and this fabulous little bottle is going in there this next Christmas! The packaging is beautiful, the smell is amazing, and it works wonders as a facial oil!...LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: jd

customer_reviews.title: Nice oil
customer_reviews.text: The smell is wonderful!. It is smooth and silky on the body and makes my hair smell exotic. I cant wait use with my jade roller and make it a pair of my beauty regimen.
customer_reviews.author: Latasha A

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I use this on my face in the morning before I put on my makeup and in the evening after I take my makeup off. Smells great and I really think it does wonders for my skin. Not too oily or greasy feeling, it absorbs pretty well. I like the smell but some others may find it takes getting used to. Overall I really recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: beautifully fragrant, yet incredibly gentle and hydrating
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing! I have incredibly sensitive skin, and am cautious about the products I use to care for it. This oil is beautifully fragrant, yet incredibly gentle and hydrating. I've just started using it on my face and dry scalp, and am loving it so far. It smells and feels fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Shellybomb

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and moisturizing!!
customer_reviews.text: A beautiful bottle of moisturizing oil!! It's a large bottle and smells amazing! The dropper doesn't hold the oil well, so be careful and let it drop back into the bottle for a bit before using.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie A Petrus

customer_reviews.title: Feels and smells so good.
customer_reviews.text: At first I used this with my moisturizer, but now I use it strictly with my body lotion. I love the smell, the moisture, and feel of this oil!
customer_reviews.author: auriel

customer_reviews.title: Smells fantastic and works beautifully
customer_reviews.text: I use this on my face after cleansing every night. It has a great smell and leaves my face feeling soft. I have noticed a more even skin tone after using this for a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly E. Niemeyer

customer_reviews.title: Great Eye Makeup Remover
customer_reviews.text: Great Eye Makeup Remover!! I took the recommendation of one of their emails to use a few drops as an eye make up remover. Took my eye makeup right off!! Without irritation. As worked nice as body lotion too. Look forward to using it other uses.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Best oil I purchased
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product!!!!! My everyday oil that i use on my body and face. Gives me a glow. Keeps my skin smooth all day. When i started using this oil, many people would compliment my skin on how it was glowing and beautiful. Try it!!!! Worth it!
customer_reviews.author: katiana

customer_reviews.title: This oil is pure perfection no matter what your skin ...
customer_reviews.text: This oil is pure perfection no matter what your skin type! I've been using it for about a month before giving an accurate review (I paid for mine, didn't get it for free) and wow! My skin is has noticeably changed! It's much more balanced as far as hydration and radiant!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding! My wife got this for me to be used as Gabe and beard oil. It's absolutely great for both. The smell is a bit too sweet, but it quickly fades. It's a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne B

customer_reviews.title: Hydrating and smooth.
customer_reviews.text: Received this product in the mail today and instantly opened it and tried it on my skin I have very dry skin so this product was amazing feeling definitely makes my skin feels super soft smooth and hydrated.
customer_reviews.author: allie

customer_reviews.title: Best Product in the Universe!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I had a severe irritation that nothing could alleviate. I put this oil on and within ours the inflammation decreased! This is truly pure and organic. Smells celestial! This is a healing oil! I recommend it with my eyes closed!!!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Theis

customer_reviews.title: Bad smell
customer_reviews.text: Oil is nice but the smell is awful. I’m planned to return but the oil is good.
customer_reviews.author: nurseclm

customer_reviews.title: Smells and feels amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Will definitely be purchasing this oil again. It smells amazing and is soooo hydrating. I use it on my clients for lymphatic drainage cupping facials. And scalp massages. You really can use it anywhere. Nice big bottle too so you don’t run out of it too fast
customer_reviews.author: Faves

customer_reviews.title: Multi purpose oil for Face, body, hands or hair!
customer_reviews.text: An amazing oil! I use it everyday on my face, hands and body. Absorbs well and is non greasy. Beautiful fragrance! I’m in love with it! A must try. ❤️
customer_reviews.author: badkitty

customer_reviews.title: Smells wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love the scent of this oil! Absorbs quickly and the dropper is convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This oil has changed my skin! It is soft and hydrated- never thought I would feel my skin like this again! Get it!
customer_reviews.author: Lightsparks

customer_reviews.title: I really like this oil
customer_reviews.text: I use this oil for my body and hair. It works really well.
customer_reviews.author: Shantel Jack

customer_reviews.title: Vet good for face
customer_reviews.text: I simply love it. I have began to use it on my face and have already noticed a difference with pores. I was using Clarin's lotus oil and this is very similar to it!
customer_reviews.author: Donnie

customer_reviews.title: Lovely oil and nice packaging
customer_reviews.text: I am using this as a base for other oils, as it is heavy to use on its own as a facial oil... it is a lovely blend. It takes time to find out how well the skin likes it...
customer_reviews.author: Ms. R. McMahon

customer_reviews.title: skeptical at first, but in love now
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to use an oil on my face, but after a week of using it, I have gotten nothing but compliments on how nice my skin looks!!
customer_reviews.author: LexieLee

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this little oil, I use it for facial cupping and it leaves my skin beautiful and glowing
customer_reviews.author: NemaIpa

customer_reviews.title: Super soft skin now!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this oil! My skin is so soft now, I use it on my entire body not just my face.
customer_reviews.author: TTotalshopper

customer_reviews.title: Excellent moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: After just using moisturizing lotion my face is noticeably dry by the end of the day. Using the Amaki Organic Essential Oil helps keep my face moist throughout the day. I also add a hyaluronic acid serum as well. I'm very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Ms Leeny

customer_reviews.title: Perfect body oil
customer_reviews.text: This body oil is amazing! It has a fresh scent and soaks in quickly. I put it on right after the shower, and my legs are perfectly smooth. I think it may have helped with razor bumps I used to get, too!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn S.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice packaging, including the cute little rose buds floating ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice packaging, including the cute little rose buds floating in the oil. Smell is nice. Have been using for a week and already have gotten compliments on how flawless my skin is. Amazing price for such a great product - other companies sell their beauty oils for around $50!
customer_reviews.author: Shawna

customer_reviews.title: Great - If you like almonds
customer_reviews.text: Lovely oil - I felt the almond oil was too strong - I didn't get a lot of rose or jasmine scent over all of that almond. The oil serves it's purpose and is an excellent beauty oil, but I really wanted more scent than Almonds.
customer_reviews.author: K. Dammann

customer_reviews.title: OUTSTANDING ESSENTIAL OIL
customer_reviews.text: The oil is very moisturizing and the scent is out of this world!!! It has little pieces inside which I couldn't figure out what they were, maybe rose petals? Will buy again although the bottle is plenty big!!
customer_reviews.author: M. CEPERO

customer_reviews.title: Arrived quickly!!
customer_reviews.text: It smells amazing!! Feels nice on the skin, and is really light!
customer_reviews.author: tony salinas

customer_reviews.title: I love this oil
customer_reviews.text: I love this oil! Been using it on hair, body, hands.. so nourishing and smells wonderful! Feels like such a luxury item with the floating petals in the bottle but the price is not crazy expensive! Great product!!
customer_reviews.author: HJC

customer_reviews.title: Comforting skin oil
customer_reviews.text: This is quite fragrant and not greasy. Keeps skin moisturized and soft. It is a bit more expensive than regular body oils and lotions.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Bad luck this time
customer_reviews.text: I loved this oil before, and really was excited to get a new bottle. Unfortunately this time my bottle was not packaged as nicely as before, and the bottle was about 1/4 used up, with some of the oil leaking into the box it came in. I feel bad saying this but I probably won't purchase this again. :(
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This is the best face/body oil. It’s a delight. I love to add it to my face, hair, and body routine. It lasted me about an entire year and you only need a few drops here and there. The scent makes you smell fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Tekikki

customer_reviews.title: Only thing I was disappointed about was that the packaging wasn't quite as pretty ...
customer_reviews.text: I am just slightly obsessed with this product. After washing my face and applying the oil, my skin is so soft and moisturized without looking oily. I also use it on my nails before bed because I have dry cuticles and it has been working wonders; no pesky little hang nails. Also helps with a smooth makeup application, never looks or feels cakey! Only thing I was disappointed about was that the packaging wasn't quite as pretty as previous reviews had received. Just black tissue paper for me. Lol 10/10 would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Not like it used to be. Terrible new formula
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for a long time. It used to be my favorite product. I don’t know what they did but it’s horrible. Smells like fake men’s cologne and it even burns my eyes. I’m super disappointed that they have clearly changed the formula and are not using natural fragrance.
customer_reviews.author: In Bloom

customer_reviews.title: Everyone Needs This.
customer_reviews.text: I love this oil. It is amazing. I live in a really dry area and i use this every time i get out of the shower it it moisturizes my skin so well. I mix it with my lotion, my facial scrub, and before i put on make up to give my skin a glow. It's a multi-purpose oil and its great. I am already in the works to purchase my next bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Michaelangelo Brown

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing and light weight great ingredients, I'm noticing terrific improvements in my skin. Will buy again
customer_reviews.author: YG

customer_reviews.title: Smells great feels great and looks beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Little rose buds floating in the oil are a nice touch
customer_reviews.author: Nico M.

customer_reviews.title: The scent is exactly like smelling a rose and the oil is lighter than ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived earlier than expected and immediately had to use it! The scent is exactly like smelling a rose and the oil is lighter than expected. I only had to use 3 drops for my face and neck, and it left my skin silky smooth. My only question is whether I should store it in the fridge or not - I've heard that EPO goes bad rather quickly, but I haven't seen any reviews with this product mentioning it going bad so I'm unsure.
customer_reviews.author: Sierra

customer_reviews.title: Buy this oil!!!
customer_reviews.text: This oil is amazing. My skin cleared up, the tone is far more even and is softer than ever. A little goes a long way. Oh, and it smells divine!! I couldn't be happier with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: musicwhiz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Works great for face and hair. Leaves my face super soft and hydrated, not greasy at all. Helps nourish my curly hair. Also doesn’t make my hair greasy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The smell is amazing and it makes my skin absolutely glow
customer_reviews.text: I have exceptionally sensitive skin and this hasn't made my perioral dermatitis come back. The smell is amazing and it makes my skin absolutely glow. I am still excited about this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Mick

customer_reviews.title: Competitive product....
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product......great value......my wife and I both use it on a daily basis. The scent is very subtle and pleasant
customer_reviews.author: Richard A. Teichman, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff made my face break out., not at all what I thought it would be. A waste of money honestly.

customer_reviews.title: Amaki Jasmine & Rose Nourishing Oil + Grapefruit Deep Cleansing Oil
customer_reviews.text: High-quality skincare products that feel good, smell great, and work wonderfully. Highly recommend!

customer_reviews.title: Hair and nails too beautiful smell
customer_reviews.text: Love it makes my skin so beautiful and soft shine
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: lovely scent, easily absorbable
customer_reviews.text: This has a mild floral scent and feels great on the skin. There was no staining on my clothes. I used if for my body and hair, even a tiny bit on my face.
customer_reviews.author: mdm

customer_reviews.title: Love this oil and how it smells
customer_reviews.text: I love this oil. I use it daily since I live in a dry climate (Colorado). The packaging is also so cute unlike other Amazon products. The smell is heavenly!
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this stuff
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this stuff! Smells amazing, feels amazing, good price, pretty to look at on my shelf :-) I have acne and was worried how the oil would act on my face, but so far I think it's made my face clearer!
customer_reviews.author: leah johston

customer_reviews.title: Best ever.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best oil I've ever used. My face looks amazing since using it. It's very hydrated and soft now. I never leave reviews but this had to be reviewed. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Brie86

customer_reviews.title: ♥️ This Stuff
customer_reviews.text: Love this!!! Put it on my body right after I get out of the bath. And put it on my face also, makes your skin so soft and smells really nice too.
customer_reviews.author: tracy Mannon

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: “Lovely scent, absorbs without a greasy residue. Very happy with Amaki Jasmine and Rose Nourishing Oil. ”

customer_reviews.title: Did NOT smell like jasmine!
customer_reviews.text: This is my third bottle. I love this stuff, BUT this bottle has NO lovely jasmine smell. It smells old. I am returning for a new one. Hopefully they have not changed their formula.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I loved
customer_reviews.text: This oil is delicious for the skin. My acne marks are fading. I recommend it

customer_reviews.title: Feels and smells great
customer_reviews.text: This oil has a great feel on my face, as well as a very calming scent. I use it every night before bed and it leaves my skin feeling soft and nourished!

customer_reviews.title: Would Not Buy Again--Does Not Absorb Well Enough
customer_reviews.text: Not bad and I will not send it back but will not buy again

customer_reviews.title: Great size and smell!
customer_reviews.text: Great size for the price and great for skin and made major improvements!

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love
customer_reviews.text: I'm loving this product! I've been using it in tandem with a pore-reducing (natural) cleanser, and my skin hasn't looked so good in years! It's soft, and not greasy at all.

customer_reviews.title: Smells awful

customer_reviews.text: My skin is ultra dry and the rosehip oil gives my skin a soft, glowing look! I really like the feel of my face when I apply this oil>

customer_reviews.title: great smell.
customer_reviews.text: ice but does not seem to soften skin over long term that is why i waited to write this review. great smell.
customer_reviews.author: progress

customer_reviews.title: Though rose isn't my favorite scent, it does smell nice
customer_reviews.text: I've just started using, but the oil absorbs quickly. Though rose isn't my favorite scent, it does smell nice. I am using for my face and scalp. So glad I received this just before the cold blast we are getting to keep my skin from drying out.
customer_reviews.author: BodieMo

product_meta.title: Amaki Organic Essential Oil for Face, Body, Lip, Hair Nails - Blend of Rosehip, Jojoba, Sweet Almond, Primrose, Argan, Jasmine - Effective Facial Moisturizer Serum - Reduces Wrinkles, Acne Scar
feature_bullets: ALL NATURAL GOODNESS: Treat your skin, hair, & nails to an all-natural blend of 8 of the most nutrient-rich vegan essential oils. Amaki includes gluten-free certified organic evening primrose, argan, jojoba, sweet almond, bergamot, rose geranium, vitamin E, jasmine, & rose hip oil.

EXPERIENCE UNRIVALED FRESHNESS: Unlike other oils on the market, every bottle of our Jasmine and Rose Essential Oil is lovingly and meticulously handcrafted in California with carefully handpicked ingredients and produced in small batches for superior freshness and optimum results.

NON-GREASY & LIGHTWEIGHT: Great for oily, dry, or combination skin, our anti-aging face oil quickly gets absorbed without leaving a sticky feeling or causing any irritation. You can safely use this organic rejuvenating serum alone or layered with other skincare products

ENJOY THE BENEFITS: This natural essential oils blend acts as an effective organic facial moisturizer, hair shine serum, and nail growth serum, helps reduce wrinkles, is a great way to remove dark circles under eyes, and features an inviting floral fragrance that relaxes & relieves stress with every application

GREAT GIFT IDEA: Beautifully presented in a lovely box and decorated with floating rosebuds inside the bottle, this face serum for women and men makes a memorable gift right out of the box. Highlight that special someone’s day with the best oil for face and hair. Click ‘Add to Cart’ now!
